founders.name: Tara Nabatian
founders.title: Senior Graphic Designer
founders.description: Hi, I'm a creative graphic designer with expertise in logo and branding design. I hold a bachelor's degree from the University of Science and Culture. I'm passionate about crafting compelling visual identities that capture your brand's essence.

founders.name: Saba Ebrahimi
founders.title: Senior Graphic Designer
founders.description: Hi, I'm creative advertising designer with demonstrated history of working in the digital marketing. Skilled in Design, Motion Graphics, Branding and Print. I've got master graduated from University of Science and Culture.
